paragraphs.title: Define function for LDAP authentication
paragraphs.text:
%python
from ldap3 import Server, Connection, NTLM, ALL

ldap_server = 'YOUR_SERVER'
ldap_domain = 'YOUR_DOMAIN'
ldap_base_dn = 'YOUR_BASE_DN'

def check_credentials(username, password):

    ldap_username = ldap_domain + '\\' + username;
    
    server = Server(ldap_server, get_info=ALL)
    conn = Connection(server, authentication=NTLM, user=ldap_username, password=password, raise_exceptions=False)
    
    try:
        if not conn.bind():
            return False, None
            
        base_dn = ldap_base_dn
        user_filter = '(sAMAccountName={0})'.format(username)
        
        conn.search(base_dn, user_filter, attributes=['memberOf', 'displayName', 'mail'])
        
        user_email = conn.response[0]['attributes']['mail']
        user_display_name = conn.response[0]['attributes']['displayName']
        user_info = { 'username': username, 'email': user_email, 'displayName': user_display_name }
        
        conn.unbind()
        
        return True, user_info
    except LDAPException as e:
        return False, None

paragraphs.title: Test user authentication
paragraphs.text:
%python
username = 'YOUR_USERNAME'
password = 'YOUR_PASSWORD'

success, user_info = check_credentials(username, password)

print 'authorized: {}'.format(success)
if success:
    print 'user name: {}'.format(user_info['username'])
    print 'user email: {}'.format(user_info['email'])
    print 'user display name: {}'.format(user_info['displayName'])
